stories.title: Match washed out by heavy rain
stories.subTitle: Netherlands v Bermuda, 1st ODI, Amstelveen
stories.summary: The first ODI between Bermuda and Netherlands in Amstelveen was abandoned after heavy rain ruled out any chance of play. The second and final match is scheduled for Friday
